Utility and debugging functions

These functions are provided for convenience, mainly for debugging. As such, they are not part of the official API for sending data via the IPDR protocol.

Because these use extra parts of the C standard library (such as stdio), they must be activated by a "<code>#define IPDR_UTILITIES</code>" (see Config.h)
